content: there are many slashings with a few validators in it (most of them have a single one), i've looked at a couple of them and noticed that the target epoch of one of the attestations that have a few attesters is quite old, potentially it is from the low participation epochs. My question is why slashings from most recent epochs aren't included in every block? Is this because of attester slashing pools are full of old slashings?

author: m.kalinin
content: If there is a queue of slashings either on the slashing pool or slasher sides (i don't know how slashers do work), then slashings with broader intersection should be prioritized

author: sproul
content: proposers packing blocks will be prioritising large intersections, but the slasher itself has a hard time computing maximal intersections and will just produce whatever it can
